system.summary: Collect tiny creatures suitable for use as fishing bait.

description.value: As a Rest Action in any location with vegetation, you can search for insects and invertebrates that are suitable for use as fishing bait. Make an Intelligence (Nature) check against DC 8. On a success, you find 1d4 Fishing Bait. You find 1 additional piece of Fishing Bait for every 3 your roll exceeds the DC by.
